Actors: Judy Greer, Jamie Lee Curtis, Miles Robbins, Virginia Gardner
Writer: John Carpenter (characters), Jeff Fradley, David Gordon Green (screenplay), Debra Hill (characters), Danny McBride (screenplay)
Plot: Laurie Strode comes to her final confrontation with Michael Myers, the masked figure who has haunted her since she narrowly escaped his killing spree on Halloween night four decades ago.
Title: Halloween
